verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-tel}ప్రభువా చేసితివి వాగ్దానములు మాతో నెరవేర్చితివి బహు నేర్పుతోడన్ సన్నుతించెదనో ప్రభువా{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vedikitivi nannu nee vaakyamuche Thagina kaalamuna ninnu cheran tharuna Mitchitivi sottani nannu nee putruni jeya Kadigitivi nee rakhtamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Baaludanu bhaavana valadantivi Bahu janambulaku Pravakhtagaa niyaminchitivi Garbhamunande roopinchina prabhoo Pedanaina nenu poojintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhaya bheetilo naaku abayamu nitchi Vijrumbinchina virodhipai vijayamunitchi Kattanu naatanu naa notanu nee maata Nunchina prabhoo kirtintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mandira mahimanu hetchulonuncha Sainyaadhipati needu samaadhanamu Nitchi ee stalamunu needu shaantito nimpina Shaalemu raajaa stotrintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mosheku neevu maata nitchi natlu Adugidu prati stalamu lannitini Maakitchutaku parishuddatmatho nimpina Prabhuvaa palu maatalatho pranutintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Iha para manduna sarvaadhi kaarivai shishyulaku Nee aajna nitchina aatma deva Yugaantamuna nee sannidi maato Nunnandulakai stutiyintun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vardhilladantivi ye aayudhamun neeku Virodamubugaa roopinchinacho Nyaaya vimarshalo tharuna mitchitivi Nera staapana cheyan Halleluyaa{/lang-eng}
